content: **knitted shawl in drops fabel the piece is worked back and forth with garter stitch and row of holes ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no fa-433 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** measurements height in middle approx 30 cm = 11 3/4 length along top approx 172 cm = 67 1/2 **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100 g color 153 texmex **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 40 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 needles drops circular needle size 4 mm = us 6 length 80 cm = 32 needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller needle size
